title: Selfish Jean
content:
One of my favorite bands, Travis, has just released a new album (The Boy With No Name) and a single, Selfish Jean.  
With Selfish Jean comes a website ( [http://www.selfishjean.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101203911/http:/www.selfishjean.com/ "http://www.selfishjean.com")), where one can confess acts of selfishness, donate for a good cause and download a free font. Design credits of the font go to Martin Demetri, but my guess is, it's based on his handwriting.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131101203911im_/http:/typophile.com/files/selfishjean_6411.jpg)
author: mili
